/usr/bin/c++    -rdynamic CMakeFiles/wii-scale.dir/wii-scale.cpp.o CMakeFiles/wii-scale.dir/XWiiMonitor.cpp.o CMakeFiles/wii-scale.dir/XWiiIface.cpp.o CMakeFiles/wii-scale.dir/UDev.cpp.o CMakeFiles/wii-scale.dir/UDevDevice.cpp.o CMakeFiles/wii-scale.dir/BlueZDevice.cpp.o  -o wii-scale -Wl,-Bstatic -lboost_program_options -Wl,-Bdynamic -lpthread -lxwiimote -ludev -lgiomm-2.4 -lgio-2.0 -lglibmm-2.4 -lgobject-2.0 -lglib-2.0 -lsigc-2.0
